title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Dismisses Fears That AI Will Replace Software Tools
description: Speaking at an artificial intelligence conference in San Francisco hosted by Cisco Systems, Huang said worries that AI will make software companies less relevant are misguided.
content:
Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang dismissed fears that artificial intelligence will replace software and related tools, calling the idea “illogical,” after a significant selloff in global software stocks on Tuesday.

title: How Anthropic's Claude AI tool could impact IT jobs? Software veteran is 'sad': 'Will never ever write code by hand again'
description: Global software and data analytics firms saw significant drops today. Investors reacted to growing worries about artificial intelligence.
